casebody.data:
In the Matter of C.B. (Appealed by Respondent-Father). No. 368P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 12, 2004. Sofie W. Hosford, for Father. E.B. Borden Parker, Goldsboro, for Wayne County DSS. Timothy I. Finan, Goldsboro, for GAL. Angela H. Brown, for Mother.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 22nd day of July 2004 by Respondent-Father in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 12th day of August 2004."
